description: Detects suspicious command line that adds an account to the local administrators/administrateurs group
name: Add User to Local Administrators
query: (((process.command_line.text:*localgroup\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\ \/add*) OR (process.command_line.text:*Add\-LocalGroupMember\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\ \-Group\ *)) AND process.command_line.text:(*\ administrators\ * OR *\ administrateur*))
author: Florian Roth
Nasreddine Bencherchali
